# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $10,000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure a remarkable deal while experiencing the unparalleled value this product offers. I look forward to hearing your response soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
